price: 4. Kasi tozali na bokoki ya kobongisa ye. (mpe kozongisa ye lolenge azalaki)
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
